revised_title: Cruise of H.M.S. 'Challenger': Exploring the Depths and Discoveries of the Melanesian Sea
tldr: The author, Prof. Wyville Thomson, reports on the cruise of H.M.S. 'Challenger' from July to November 1874, detailing their observations and findings in the Melanesian Sea. They discuss the fauna and flora discovered at various depths, the temperature distribution, and the unique characteristics of the region.
